segments.advisor_message: Okay, so let's start with some basic info. Can you please tell me your full name? Like, your first name and last name, and if you have any middle names?
segments.client_message: Um, yeah, sure. I'm, uh, John, and last name is Smith, but, uh, I actually, like, I don't really use a middle name, so just, um, John Smith is good.

segments.advisor_message: Great, thanks John! And, uh, do you have any title you go by, like Mr. or anything?
segments.client_message: Actually, you know, I was Mr., but, uh, I think I wanna just go with, like, just John now, so no title, just that, yeah.
